properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 10:13PM EST until January 4 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
* WINDS...Northwest 10 to 20 knots.

* WAVES...3 to 5 feet.

A Gale Watch has also been issued. This Gale Watch is in effect
from Sunday afternoon through late Sunday night.

* WINDS....Southwest wind 15 to 25 knots on Sunday veering west
20 to 25 knots in the afternoon. Gusts up to 35 knot gales.

* WAVES... Waves 3 to 6 feet building to 4 to 10 feet,
occasionally to 13 feet in the afternoon.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

A Gale Watch is issued when the risk of gale force winds of 34 to
47 knots has significantly increased...but the specific timing
and/or location is still uncertain. It is intended to provide
additional lead time for mariners who may wish to consider
altering their plans.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT
